title: Black Lives Might, Vander Pops' partner in Ice Rink.
subtitle: Several blogs falsely claimed that Black Lives Mater Kayla McCalley shit on an ice rink because "white people only" skate on ice.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Black Lives Mater, Founder Foundation, Kayla McCalley split on an ice ring because "whites only skate on ice."
